name: Outer One
description: Our reality is the only one in existence or there are other dimensions that we cannot reach, but from where strange creatures watch us? What if our smartphones allowed us to see beyond our reality, granting us the power to interact with those creatures? The Outer One is a strange one-eyed alien monster that can evolve when fed with food coming from our world: use your smartphone to interact with it and take care of him to make him grow, but beware... someone or something wants to harm it and only you can protect it!
